thread.title: Amazing location, and excellent customer service
thread.title_full: Amazing location, and excellent customer service - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gregoriod825
title: Amazing location, and excellent customer service
text: I was very impressed with the customer service, I felt I was staying at Waldorf Astoria, their attention to detail definitely made me feel like a VIP. The room was high enough that I got a very nice view on New York.
